data.name: GAIM Hunting and Shooting simulator
data.description: Improve your skills as a hunter or sports shooter with GAIM virtual training simulator. Practice shooting and hunting in the comfort of your home, and with more sophisticated tools than at the shooting range. Precise barrel tracking, correct animal anatomy and correct ballistics ensure detailed understanding of your shooting technique. Together with analysis and replay of every shot, this simulator will take your training to the next level. Practice on targets where you set the distance, speed and direction then test your skills on running game in driven hunt scenarios or a set sport shooting scenario.

changelog.change_log: With new scenarios:  SimPro Sportshooter and GAIM of Steel. Updated Time Challenge and IPSC with new weapon type. New weapon type available for Sportshooting: Pistol

Including Wild Boar Corn Field, a scenario that is requested from German hunters and inspired by harvesting the corn crops.
Including 5-Stand, a clay pigeon scenario with almost infinite variation of throwers.
Bug fixes, stabilization
Bug fixes + updated shotgun back to endless magazine
New engine with better performance and better stability, new menus to improve navigation, new SimPro scenario with all animals and new menu and many preparations for releases to come.

New scenario: High Pheasants
Bug fixes, stability improvements

Update with a demo version of wild boar hunt in winter forest and mallard duck hunt in archipelago environment. These demo versions are for users with no license key and no rifle controller. The full version (with license key) is for users that have bought the full hunting simulator with rifle controller and all software from www.gaim.com. If you use demo version with only hand control, it is not possible to improve your shooting skills.

Please note, this is not a game, it is a hunting simulator to practice your shooting skills.
